vulnerabilities.name: Session Fixation
vulnerabilities.evidence: Server accepted and maintained the injected session ID 'ScannerTestFixation123' after login.

vulnerabilities.name: Authentication Weakness
vulnerabilities.evidence: No rate limiting (HTTP 429) or lockout detected after multiple rapid failed login attempts.

vulnerabilities.name: Authentication Weakness
vulnerabilities.evidence: No rate limiting (HTTP 429) or lockout detected after multiple rapid failed login attempts.

vulnerabilities.name: SQL Injection (Form-Based/Error)
vulnerabilities.evidence: Error reflection in response
vulnerabilities.request:
GET http://localhost/setup.php
User-Agent: python-requests/2.32.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, zstd
Accept: */*
Connection: keep-alive
Cookie: security=low; PHPSESSID=qeuobd555nrcb611t02lka5ur6
vulnerabilities.response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Date: Thu, 19 Feb 2026 10:53:00 GMT
Server: Apache/2.4.25 (Debian)
Expires: Tue, 23 Jun 2009 12:00:00 GMT
Cache-Control: no-cache, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Vary: Accept-Encoding
Content-Encoding: gzip
Content-Length: 1651
Keep-Alive: timeout=5, max=9
Connection: Keep-Alive
Content-Type: text/html;charset=utf-8


<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd">

vulnerabilities.name: Clickjacking (UI Redressing)
vulnerabilities.evidence: Missing or invalid X-Frame-Options header. Missing frame-ancestors in Content-Security-Policy.

vulnerabilities.name: Command Injection (RCE)
